::: {.Exercise data-latex=""}

Pour chaque réaction déterminez l'acide, la base, l'acide conjugué et la base conjuguée (selon la définition de Brønsted-Lowry). 

a. $\ce{NH3_{(aq)} + H2O_{(l)} <=> NH4^+_{(aq)} + OH^{-}_{(aq)}}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}
b. $\ce{HSO4^{-}_{(aq)} + H2O_{(l)} <=> SO4^{2-}_{(aq)} + H3O^+_{(aq)}}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}
c. $\ce{HF_{(aq)} + H2O_{(l)} <=> F^{-}_{(aq)} + H3O^+_{(aq)}}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}
d. $\ce{PO4^{3-}_{(aq)} + H2O_{(l)} <=> HPO4^{2-}_{(aq)} + OH^{-}_{(aq)}}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}
<!--e. $\ce{HClO_{(aq)} + H2O_{(l)} <=> ClO^{-}_{(aq)} + H3O^+_{(aq)}}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}
f. $\ce{CH3COO^{-}_{(aq)} + H2O_{(l)} <=> CH3COOH_{(aq)} + OH^{-}_{(aq)}}$
\vspace{\stretch{1}}-->

:::

::: {.Answer data-latex=""}

a. $$ \ce{$\underset{\text{base}}{\ce{NH3_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{acide}}{\ce{H2O_{(l)}}}$ <=> $\underset{\text{acide conjugué}}{\ce{NH4^+_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{base conjuguée}}{\ce{OH^{-}_{(aq)}}}$} $$
b. $$ \ce{$\underset{\text{acide}}{\ce{HSO4^{-}_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{base}}{\ce{H2O_{(l)}}}$ <=> $\underset{\text{base conjuguée}}{\ce{SO4^{2-}_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{acide conjugué}}{\ce{H3O^+_{(aq)}}}$} $$
c. $$ \ce{$\underset{\text{acide}}{\ce{HF_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{base}}{\ce{H2O_{(l)}}}$ <=> $\underset{\text{base conjuguée}}{\ce{F^{-}_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{acide conjugué}}{\ce{H3O^+_{(aq)}}}$} $$
d. $$ \ce{$\underset{\text{base}}{\ce{PO4^{3-}_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{acide}}{\ce{H2O_{(l)}}}$ <=> $\underset{\text{acide conjugué}}{\ce{HPO4^{2-}_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{base conjuguée}}{\ce{OH^{-}_{(aq)}}}$} $$
<!--e. $$ \ce{$\underset{\text{acide}}{\ce{HClO_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{base}}{\ce{H2O_{(l)}}}$ <=> $\underset{\text{base conjuguée}}{\ce{ClO^{-}_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{acide conjugué}}{\ce{H3O^+_{(aq)}}}$} $$
f. $$ \ce{$\underset{\text{base}}{\ce{CH3COO^{-}_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{acide}}{\ce{H2O_{(l)}}}$ <=> $\underset{\text{acide conjugué}}{\ce{CH3COOH_{(aq)}}}$ + $\underset{\text{base conjuguée}}{\ce{OH^{-}_{(aq)}}}$} $$-->

:::
